tool_description:
Bonai News API, an alternative to Bing News API and Google News, is a content delivery platform that provides access to millions of news articles from over 100,000 news sources and blogs around the world.

It offers a REST API that allows developers to easily integrate news content into your applications.
name: Bonai News API
title: Bonai News API

api_list.name: Search Publishers
api_list.description: This endpoint provides a list of news publishers, giving you ability to access detailed information about each publisher, including their description, logo, language, category, and social media links.

required_parameters.name: category
required_parameters.description:
Possible options:
- General
- Business
- Entertainment
- Lifestyle
- Politics
- Science
- Sports
- Technology

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: Keywords or a phrase to search for.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description:
2-letter ISO 639-1 code of the article language.

Tip: use [/languages-by-countries](url) endpoint to get language code.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The number of results to return per page.

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: The order to sort the publishers in. Possible options: ***popularity***, ***relevancy***. Default ***relevancy***.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description:
2-letter ISO 3166-1 code of the country.

Tip: use [/languages-by-countries](url) endpoint to get country code.

api_list.name: Trending Topic
api_list.description:
This endpoint allows you to access the most popular article for a specific country, language, and topic category.

Since subtopics are only accessible to **Ultra**  and **Mega** users, **Basic** and **Pro** users can only access the following topics:
- General
- World
- Business
- Technology
- Entertainment
- Sports
- Science
- Lifestyle
- Politics

required_parameters.name: topic
required_parameters.description:
The topic of interest. Example: ***Sports***, or subtopic ***Soccer***.

Tip: use [/topics](url) endpoint to get topic name.

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description:
2-letter ISO 639-1 code of the article language.

Tip: use [/languages-by-countries](url) endpoint to get language code.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The number of results to return per page.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description:
2-letter ISO 3166-1 code of the country.

Tip: use [/languages-by-countries](url) endpoint to get country code.

api_list.name: Topics
api_list.description:
This endpoint provides access to a list of topics and subtopics. 

Since subtopics are only accessible to **Ultra**  and **Mega** users, **Basic** and **Pro** users can only access the following topics:
- General
- World
- Business
- Technology
- Entertainment
- Sports
- Science
- Lifestyle
- Politics
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bonai-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/v1/topics"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bonai-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://bonai-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/v1/topics"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bonai-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Random Article
api_list.description: This endpoint provides you a straightforward to discover new and engaging content by randomly selecting an article, with the added flexibility to filter the results based on country or language.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description:
2-letter ISO 639-1 code of the article language.

Tip: use [/languages-by-countries](url) endpoint to get language code.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: The type of article content. Possible options: ***html***, ***plaintext***. Default ***html***.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description:
2-letter ISO 3166-1 code of the country.

Tip: use [/languages-by-countries](url) endpoint to get country code.

api_list.name: Article Content
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to retrieve the complete metadata and content of the article.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: The type of article content. Possible options: ***html***, ***plaintext***. Default ***html***.

api_list.name: Search Articles
api_list.description: This endpoint provides the ability to search news articles, allowing you to refine your search using advanced query techniques such as Boolean operators (AND, OR, NOT). You can further narrow down your results by filtering by country, language, publisher, and date range.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description:
Keywords or a phrase to search for.

Advanced search query:
   - Boolean operators: ***AND***, ***OR***, ***NOT***
  Example: `AWS OR 'amazon web services'`

   - Grouping: Use parentheses to group multiple clauses.
  Example: `cyber AND (AWS OR 'amazon web services')`

  -  Exact match: Use double quotes for exact match.
  Example: `\"nasa mission\"`

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: The order to sort the articles in. Possible options: relevancy, popularity, date:asc, date:desc. Default relevancy.

optional_parameters.name: to
optional_parameters.description: A date in ISO 8601 format to filter for the newest article allowed.

optional_parameters.name: from
optional_parameters.description: A date in ISO 8601 format to filter for the oldest article allowed.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description:
2-letter ISO 639-1 code of the article language.

Tip: use [/languages-by-countries](url) endpoint to get language code.

optional_parameters.name: publisher
optional_parameters.description:
A comma-seperated for the news sources.

Example: cnn.com,bbc.com

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description:
2-letter ISO 3166-1 code of the country.

Tip: use [/languages-by-countries](url) endpoint to get country code.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The number of results to return per page.

optional_parameters.name: paywall
optional_parameters.description: A boolean to filter paywalls articles.

api_list.name: Countries and Languages
api_list.description:
This endpoint provides access to a list of supported languages, categorized by their respective countries.

The response will contain an array of objects. Each object in the array will represent a supported country and will include the following properties:
- name: The full name of the language in English
- code: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code for the country
- languages: An array of objects, each representing a supported language in that country. Each language object will include the following properties:
    - name: The full name of the language in English
    - code: The ISO 639-1 code for the language
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bonai-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/v1/languages-by-countries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bonai-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

url = "https://bonai-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/v1/languages-by-countries"

print(response.json())
